main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 18 February 1956 in Grand Maria, Minnesota, involving an object that appeared to land in Lake Superior.
interesting points: The observed object was described as being the size of a pumpkin and colored white and blue., The duration of the sighting was approximately 3.4 seconds., The initial conclusions suggested potential associations with weather balloons and an astronomical meteor., Investigators deemed the color and duration indicative of a possible meteor sighting., There were no photographs included with the report.
sighted object: an object the size of a pumpkin, white and blue in color
